item.title: Syntony
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: A reflection on how boundaries are expanded and dissolved, gifting us with effortless airiness while integrating a key sense of connection between the indoor and outdoor space.
item.content:encoded: A reflection on how boundaries are expanded and dissolved, gifting us with effortless airiness while integrating a key sense of connection between the indoor and outdoor space.

item.title: Enchantement
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: A magical and serene atmosphere shapes the sculptural elements within the outdoor space translating the design into a fairy tale scenario.
item.content:encoded: A magical and serene atmosphere shapes the sculptural elements within the outdoor space translating the design into a fairy tale scenario.

item.title: Classical Infusion
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: The vision driving this project exalts the lines and shapes composing this beautiful Chesterfield piece of art. Focus was also given to a daring and soft rhythm encompassing the whole composition.
item.content:encoded:
The vision driving this project exalts the lines and shapes composing this beautiful Chesterfield piece of art.

Focus was also given to a daring and soft rhythm encompassing the whole composition.

item.title: Greeny Green
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: Inspired by the very talented Landscape Designer Jack Merlo, I’ve approached this project with nature’s neutral palette in mind. By adding little but important tones of Pine Green throughout the Living Area, I’ve accomplished a connection from outdoor and indoor, that resulted in a flawless, luxurious and aesthetic pleasing enviroinment to chill between day and […]
item.content:encoded:
Inspired by the very talented Landscape Designer Jack Merlo, I’ve approached this project with nature’s neutral palette in mind.

By adding little but important tones of Pine Green throughout the Living Area, I’ve accomplished a connection from outdoor and indoor, that resulted in a flawless, luxurious and aesthetic pleasing enviroinment to chill between day and night.

item.title: Home Office
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: This geometrically-modern shaped room was designed with pure functionality in mind, everything is easy to reach! Clean lines and a warm, almost monochromatic palette, paint a cozy room while relieving the mind thanks to a relaxing but focused environment.
item.content:encoded:
This geometrically-modern shaped room was designed with pure functionality in mind, everything is easy to reach!
Clean lines and a warm, almost monochromatic palette, paint a cozy room while relieving the mind thanks to a relaxing but focused environment.

item.title: Blossom Vibes
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: The architecture design and its surrounding complements each other within a harmonious palette. The materials greatly helped this new development to fit harmoniously with its enclosing.
item.content:encoded: The architecture design and its surrounding complements each other within a harmonious palette. The materials greatly helped this new development to fit harmoniously with its enclosing.

item.title: Custom Armchair
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: This bespoke design was firstly inspired by “The Wing Chair” (1960) from Carl Hansen & Son and influenced by contemporary elements of design. ​ The materials for the armchair and footstool were chosen according to the client’s requirements of sustainability. The supporting structural frame is FSC certified oak and cushions are filled with natural latex.
item.content:encoded:
This bespoke design was firstly inspired by “The Wing Chair” (1960) from Carl Hansen & Son and influenced by contemporary elements of design.
​
The materials for the armchair and footstool were chosen according to the client’s requirements of sustainability.
The supporting structural frame is FSC certified oak and cushions are filled with natural latex.

item.title: Classic Kitchen
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: An “evergreen” classic styled kitchen, with ashwood cabinet shutters. The idea was to state a typical Italian countryside kitchen, fully functional yet compact, providing a warm and fulfilling space.
item.content:encoded: An “evergreen” classic styled kitchen, with ashwood cabinet shutters. The idea was to state a typical Italian countryside kitchen, fully functional yet compact, providing a warm and fulfilling space.

item.title: Neutral Bronze
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: A calm, neutral backdrop with earthy tones was chosen to complement the neutral lighting of this apartment. In the master bedroom a more daring palette becomes protagonist to emphasize reflections and intensify the textiles.
item.content:encoded: A calm, neutral backdrop with earthy tones was chosen to complement the neutral lighting of this apartment. In the master bedroom a more daring palette becomes protagonist to emphasize reflections and intensify the textiles.

item.title: Neutral Infusion
item.dc:creator: jaque_model
item.description: The purpose of this project was transforming a compact area into a cozy contemporary space, relying on a soft neutral palette for the entire design. In the living room a choice of cheerful tones of turquoise, yellow and tranquil gray were added to resemble the tropical sea.
item.content:encoded: The purpose of this project was transforming a compact area into a cozy contemporary space, relying on a soft neutral palette for the entire design. In the living room a choice of cheerful tones of turquoise, yellow and tranquil gray were added to resemble the tropical sea.
